name: Adventure Story
description:
During the invasion war of the Demons, the empire suffered serious damage. Countless heroes died on the battlefield, and a large number of artifacts were scattered around the world. Finally, with the help of angel reinforcements summoned by the Holy Church, the empire was spared from destruction and the demon tribe was driven back to the demon world.

Now, 10 years have passed since the war. The lords of various parts of the empire resumed their struggle for power while resting. With the help of angels' reinforcements, the Holy Church quickly expanded its power throughout the empire after the war, and the ambitions of the three religious leaders gradually emerged.

In order to search for scattered artifacts, you established your own Adventure Guild in Ya'an Forest on the edge of the empire. Explore this unknown continent while finding ways to support oneself and guild adventurers!



In the game, you will serve as the president of the Adventure Guild, managing and operating a small guild within the Empire.

From helping villagers find cats to the imperial business group Cole Chamber of Commerce. Various commissions are sent from various places. From a small guild with only a few people at the beginning to an adventure group later on. Upgrade and develop your guild, find powerful heroes to join the guild.

Game gameplay


The game is divided into two parts: day and night.

During the day, we will overlook the current map and constantly have commissions sent to the guild from mission points on the map. Choose to dispatch suitable heroes to resolve the commission event. After the hero arrives at the mission location, the event will be resolved and a mission briefing will be generated. You can see many interesting stories from it. After completing the commission, not only can you receive rewards, but you can also increase the guild's influence in the empire. The event will produce different results based on the hero's ability value, so the reasonable allocation of heroes to execute tasks will be the focus.

At night, we will manage various affairs of the guild. Upgrading guilds, recruiting or firing heroes, and managing items are all done at this time. Reasonably allocate every resource in your hands and continuously enhance the strength of the guild.

Game features


Manage and expand your own guild.

Each mission area has its own unique storyline.

Each map's final boss will drop a unique artifact with a huge impact.

  • Rich hero professions and hero characteristics. Multiple combinations have infinite potential.
